scripts.dev: pnpm run --filter ./packages/shared build && concurrently --names SERVER,CLIENT --prefix-colors 'yellow,blue' --kill-others 'pnpm run --filter ./packages/server dev' 'pnpm run --filter ./packages/client dev'
scripts.build: pnpm run --filter ./packages/shared build && pnpm run --filter ./packages/client build && pnpm run --filter ./packages/server build
scripts.test: pnpm run --filter ./packages/shared test && pnpm run --filter ./packages/server test
